title: Tires and Tread Life: Probability
question_text: A certain type of tire's tread life is approximately normal with a mean of $42,000\text{ miles}$ and standard deviation of $3000\text{ miles}$ . The shaded area in the figure below represents which of the following probabilities? Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

choices.text: The probability the tread life of this type of tire  is between 36000 miles 36000 miles and 45000 miles 45000 miles .
The probability the tread life of this type of tire is between 36000 miles 36000 miles and 48000 miles 48000 miles .
The probability the tread life of this type of tire is between 39000 miles 39000 miles and 45000 miles 45000 miles .
The probability the tread life of this type of tire is between 39000 miles 39000 miles and 48000 miles 48000 miles .
The probability the tread life of this type of tire is between 39000 miles 39000 miles and 51000 miles 51000 miles .
